sentences.en: An inkling of untoward deeds on the part of Hurstwood had come.
sentences.cn: 现在终于让她得知了一点赫斯渥行为不轨的消息.

sentences.en: As for me , I began to have an inkling.
sentences.cn: 我倒是渐渐明白过来了.

sentences.en: But Fan Po - wen had no inkling of this.
sentences.cn: 范博文 却也并没觉得.

sentences.en: But for a moment I an inkling about their feelings toward men.
sentences.cn: 但那一刻我对她们对男人的那种感觉有点模糊的认知.

sentences.en: He gave me an inkling of what was to come.
sentences.cn: 他给我暗示将要发生什么事.

sentences.en: He had no inkling of what was going on.
sentences.cn: 他对正在发生的事情一无所知。

sentences.en: He was beginning to have an inkling of why Mr. Lin had been detained.
sentences.cn: 他现在有点懂得林先生之所以被捕了.

sentences.en: I didn't have an inkling about it.
I had an [ no ] inkling of what he intended to do.
sentences.cn: 我略知 [ 不知道 ] 他打算做什么.

sentences.en: I had an inkling that she was pregnant.
I had no inkling of his real purpose until much later.
sentences.cn: 直到后来很久我才对他的真实目的略知一二。

sentences.en: I scrabbled beneath the table an inkling of what was to come.
sentences.cn: 我感觉到要出事,于是急忙钻到桌子底下.

sentences.en: Shelton saw from the fixed beam in her eyes that she had not an inkling.
sentences.cn: 谢尔顿从她眼睛里凝定的光波中看到她一点儿也不明白.

sentences.en: They begin to have an inkling of the mystery of things.
sentences.cn: 更聪明的人开始对事物的神秘略知一二.

sentences.en: We had an inkling that something might be happening.
sentences.cn: 我们隐约感觉可能正有什么事情发生。

sentences.en: You may get an inkling of what the astronauts have to deal with.
sentences.cn: 你会对宇航员必须应付的情况略知一二.

words.tran_cn: 暗示 （inkle的ing形式）；略知；低声说出

trans.tran_cn: 暗示 （inkle的ing形式）；略知；低声说出
